trans-unit.source: (see usage).
trans-unit.target: （请参阅用法）。

trans-unit.source: --help
trans-unit.target: - 救命

trans-unit.source: Additional formats/codecs will be implemented on request.
trans-unit.target: 其他格式/编解码器将根据要求实施。

trans-unit.source: Catching every special case of certain metadata formats and transferring it to a normalized dict is nearly impossible (especially with id3). Also different tagging program’s have certain specialities how certain uncommon tags are saved or if say are even displayed. Therefore some features are not yet or only partially supported:
trans-unit.target: 捕获某些特定的元数据格式的特殊情况并将其传输到规范化的dict几乎是不可能的（尤其是对于id3）。同样，不同的标记程序具有某些特殊性，即如何保存某些不常见的标签，甚至显示它们。因此，某些功能尚不支持或仅部分支持：

trans-unit.source: For now the only formats/codecs supported are, what I need for myself.
trans-unit.target: 目前仅支持的格式/编解码器是,我自己需要的。

trans-unit.source: Installation & Usage
trans-unit.target: 安装及使用

trans-unit.source: Only one Album Cover file is supported at the moment. More will raise Errors (will be fixed soon).
trans-unit.target: 目前只支持一个专辑封面文件。更多的文件会产生错误(即将修复)。

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: 备注

trans-unit.source: Support for id3.PairedTextFrames was dropped, since it is not used much and I haven’t found a good way to handle them. They might come back in the future. They are used for ‘TIPL: Involved People List’, ‘TMCL: Musicians Credits List’. Some taggers use these field for e.g arranger.
trans-unit.target: 对id3.PairedTextFrames的支持已被删除，因为它使用很少，而且我还没有找到处理它们的好方法。他们将来可能会回来。它们用于“ TIPL：参与人员列表”，“ TMCL：音乐家信用列表”。一些标记器将这些字段用于例如编排器。

trans-unit.source: Supported Codecs anf Formats are displayed with
trans-unit.target: 支持的编解码器和格式会以下列方式显示。

trans-unit.source: Supported Formats/Codecs
trans-unit.target: 支持的格式/编解码器

trans-unit.target: 脚本会自动安装在系统中。使用

trans-unit.source: Version Milestones
trans-unit.target: 版本里程碑

trans-unit.source: a audio file and metadata synchronization program
trans-unit.target: 音频文件和元数据同步程序

trans-unit.source: comprehensive testing and verification (release on pypi)
trans-unit.target: 全面测试和验证(在Pypi上发布)

trans-unit.target: 有关使用情况的信息，或在mmusicc.readthedocs.org上查看其使用时的输出。另请参阅以下示例：

trans-unit.source: interactive mode with text user interface (tui) to display changes
trans-unit.target: 交互式模式,用文本用户界面(tui)显示变化。

trans-unit.source: metadata working
trans-unit.target: 元数据工作

trans-unit.source: milestone
trans-unit.target: 里程碑

trans-unit.source: mmusicc can be run in graphical mode from tui (state machine)
trans-unit.target: mmusicc可以在tui(状态机)的图形模式下运行。

trans-unit.source: mmusicc is a lightweight audio file and metadata control and synchronization program to transfer the changes made in a master music library to a derived music library. New files or albums are converted using ffmpeg. When the file already exits, the metadata is compared und updated if it has changed. The individual tags and their processing can be freely selected by each user via a configuration file. There will be a simple Autofill future that can be used to fix small consistency errors, the rules will be editable in the config file (to be implemented). To Synchronize multiple folders at once, the folder structure, directory- and file-names must be identical at source and target, this should be given when this tool is used to one-way sync the master directory. Data can also be exported to or imported from a database (implementation still very basic) e.g. for a metadata backup.
trans-unit.target: mmusicc是一个轻量级的音频文件和元数据控制和同步程序,可以将主音乐库中的变化转移到衍生的音乐库中。新文件或专辑使用ffmpeg转换。当文件已经退出时,如果元数据有变化,则会进行比较和更新。每个用户可以通过配置文件自由选择各个标签及其处理方式。将来会有一个简单的自动填充功能,可以用来修复小的一致性错误,规则将在配置文件中进行编辑(待实现)。要一次同步多个文件夹,源地和目标地的文件夹结构、目录-和文件名必须完全一致,这一点在使用该工具单向同步主目录时应该给出。数据也可以导出到数据库或从数据库中导入(实现起来还是很基础的),比如元数据备份。

trans-unit.source: mmusicc is still under development and should not be used to overwrite master data. Using it for ‘slave’ data is perfectly fine. Multiple test confirm that the master files are not modified and only accessed. It is also tested that the program is deterministic.
trans-unit.target: mmusicc仍在开发中，不应用于覆盖主数据。将其用于“从属”数据完全可以。多次测试确认主文件没有被修改，只能访问。还测试了该程序是确定性的。

trans-unit.source: mmusicc shall not replace a metadata editor and only provides methods for automated syncing of large music libraries.
trans-unit.target: mmusicc不能取代元数据编辑器,只能提供大型音乐库的自动同步方法。

trans-unit.source: mmusicc working (and first package distribution (test.pypi only))
trans-unit.target: mmusicc工作(和第一个软件包发布(仅test.pypi))

trans-unit.source: mmusicc’s source code is inspired by the two music tag programs quodlibet and puddletag and uses some code fragments of those.
trans-unit.target: mmusicc的源代码受两个音乐标签程序quodlibet和puddletag的启发，并使用了其中的一些代码片段。

trans-unit.source: version
trans-unit.target: 版本
